gmcm.section.performance.tooltip: Limits to keep preloading lightweight each tick.
gmcm.enabled.name: Enabled
gmcm.enabled.tooltip: Turn the mod on or off.
gmcm.preloadWarpTargets.name: Preload warp targets
gmcm.preloadWarpTargets.tooltip: When you enter a location, preload the locations you can warp to from there (doors/exits).
gmcm.clearQueueOnWarp.name: Clear queue on warp
gmcm.clearQueueOnWarp.tooltip: Clears pending preloads whenever you change locations. Already-preloaded assets stay remembered for the day.
gmcm.customLocations.name: Custom locations
gmcm.customLocations.tooltip: Extra location names to preload (comma-separated). Example: Town, Forest, Mountain
gmcm.maxAssetsPerTick.name: Max assets per tick
gmcm.maxAssetsPerTick.tooltip: How many assets to preload each tick (0 = no limit). Lower values reduce risk of micro-stutter.
gmcm.maxMillisecondsPerTick.name: Max ms per tick
gmcm.maxMillisecondsPerTick.tooltip: Time budget per tick for preloading (0 = unlimited). If both limits are set, whichever hits first stops loading.
gmcm.verboseLogging.name: Verbose logging
gmcm.verboseLogging.tooltip: Log every asset preload to the SMAPI console (useful for debugging).
